Module jacob.mainscreen
Package jacob.mainscreen

Class ModifyPartController

java.lang.Object
jacob.mainscreen.ModifyPartController
public class ModifyPartController extends Object
The ModifyPartController class is the controller for the modify part screen. This Method is responsible for modifying the existing parts in the table.

  • Method Details

    • OnCancelModifyPartButtonPress

      public void OnCancelModifyPartButtonPress(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      The OnCancelModifyPartButtonPress is used to cancel the modification of a selected part and return to the main menu.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • OnInHouseButtonPress

      public void OnInHouseButtonPress(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      The OnInHouseButtonPress is used to switch the changing labels text to Machine ID.

    • OnOutsourcedRadioButtonPress

      public void OnOutsourcedRadioButtonPress(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      The OnOutsourcedRadioButtonPress is used to switch the changing labels text to Company Name.

    • setPart

      public void setPart(Part selectedPart)
      Sets the text fields of the modify part screen to the selectedParts current values. This method is responsible for populating the existing Part object variables into the text fields of the modify part screen.

    • OnSaveModifiedPart

      public void OnSaveModifiedPart(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      Saves a modified part to the display parts table. This method is responsible for updating existing Part objects and validating their data inputs.
      Throws:
      IOException
